svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - August 5 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 5, 2023" date: "2023-08-05"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
• Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko . Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM): agreed to use a contract rather than a precompile,
will need audit/formal verification, devnet 8 will wait for implementations EF devops launched 2.1M
validator testnet in prep for Holešky testnet EIP5806 (delegate transaction) & EIP7377 (migration
transaction) presented and broader discussions on account abstraction Verkle Trie update : performance
improvements, migration via overlay method and remaining questions
Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko . Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim :
• EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM): agreed to use a contract rather than a precompile, will need
audit/formal verification, devnet 8 will wait for implementations
EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM): agreed to use a contract rather than a precompile, will need
• EF devops launched 2.1M validator testnet in prep for Holešky testnet
EF devops launched 2.1M validator testnet in prep for Holešky testnet
• EIP5806 (delegate transaction) & EIP7377 (migration transaction) presented and broader discussions
on account abstraction
EIP5806 (delegate transaction) & EIP7377 (migration transaction) presented and broader discussions on
account abstraction
• Verkle Trie update : performance improvements, migration via overlay method and remaining questions
Verkle Trie update : performance improvements, migration via overlay method and remaining questions
• Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.1 : data gas renamed blob gas & additional tests
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.1 : data gas renamed blob gas & additional tests
• EIP4844: Terence: EIP4844 economics KZG Ceremony has 133k contributions, lobby is empty ; list of
special contributions (from satellites to cats) GossipSub optimizations (IDontWant & Limit flood
publishing) should reduce Nimbus CL client bandwidth consumption
• Terence: EIP4844 economics
Terence: EIP4844 economics
• KZG Ceremony has 133k contributions, lobby is empty ; list of special contributions (from satellites
to cats)
KZG Ceremony has 133k contributions, lobby is empty ; list of special contributions (from satellites
• GossipSub optimizations (IDontWant & Limit flood publishing) should reduce Nimbus CL client
bandwidth consumption
GossipSub optimizations (IDontWant & Limit flood publishing) should reduce Nimbus CL client bandwidth
consumption
Layer 1
• Reorg.pics : dashboard of mainnet reorgs
Reorg.pics : dashboard of mainnet reorgs
• Epoch long reorg on Goerli testnet , unlikely to happen on mainnet Ben Edgington’s explainer from
Upgrading Ethereum book
Epoch long reorg on Goerli testnet , unlikely to happen on mainnet
• Ben Edgington’s explainer from Upgrading Ethereum book
• SSZ++ : fast SSZ library, 27ms deserialization & 23ms hashing on full beacon state without caching
SSZ++ : fast SSZ library, 27ms deserialization & 23ms hashing on full beacon state without caching
• Prototype EVMMAX API in evmone: allows implementing most precompiles
Prototype EVMMAX API in evmone: allows implementing most precompiles
For stakers
• Wenmerge non-filtering MEV-Boost relay
Client releases
• Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.10.0 : performance improvements, NodeJS v20, IPv6 support, bandwidth
optimizations and builderOnly option for DVT users Teku v23.8.0 : state caching improvements & minimum
Java version updated to Java 17
• Lodestar v1.10.0 : performance improvements, NodeJS v20, IPv6 support, bandwidth optimizations and
builderOnly option for DVT users
Lodestar v1.10.0 : performance improvements, NodeJS v20, IPv6 support, bandwidth optimizations and
• Teku v23.8.0 : state caching improvements & minimum Java version updated to Java 17
Teku v23.8.0 : state caching improvements & minimum Java version updated to Java 17
Research
• Vitalik: nuances of data recoverability in data availability sampling
Vitalik: nuances of data recoverability in data availability sampling
• Protocol-enforced proposer commitments (PEPC) FAQ
Protocol-enforced proposer commitments (PEPC) FAQ
• Relays post-ePBS & proposed Top-of-Block (ToB) payments
Relays post-ePBS & proposed Top-of-Block (ToB) payments
• Potuz: three dichotomies in ePBS
Potuz: three dichotomies in ePBS
Layer 2
• Offchain Labs BOLD (Bounded Liquidity Delay): proposed dispute protocol for permissionless
validation of Arbitrum chains, eliminates delay attack vector
Offchain Labs BOLD (Bounded Liquidity Delay): proposed dispute protocol for permissionless validation
of Arbitrum chains, eliminates delay attack vector
• Popcorn: zkEVMs criticize each other over attribution and marketing claims
Popcorn: zkEVMs criticize each other over attribution and marketing claims
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs: EIP7441 : Upgrade block proposer election to Whisk
EIPs:
• EIP7441 : Upgrade block proposer election to Whisk
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7425 : Tokenized reserve ERC7432 : NFT roles ERC7439 : Prevent ticket
touting (ERC721 extension) ERC7444 : Time locks maturity
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7425 : Tokenized reserve
ERC7425 : Tokenized reserve
• ERC7432 : NFT roles
ERC7432 : NFT roles
• ERC7439 : Prevent ticket touting (ERC721 extension)
ERC7439 : Prevent ticket touting (ERC721 extension)
• ERC7444 : Time locks maturity
ERC7444 : Time locks maturity
Stuff for developers
• Hardhat v2.17.1 : Solidity v0.8.21 support, console.log in pure functions & improved flattening
Hardhat v2.17.1 : Solidity v0.8.21 support, console.log in pure functions & improved flattening
• Foundry: Tip: generate local coverage reports using lcov
Foundry:
• Tip: generate local coverage reports using lcov
• Dan Finlay’s MATT auction (maximize NFT revenue) in Foundry, uses ERC20 allowance as bid
Dan Finlay’s MATT auction (maximize NFT revenue) in Foundry, uses ERC20 allowance as bid
• web3.py WebSocketProviderV2 : rewrite of WebsocketProvider, beta
web3.py WebSocketProviderV2 : rewrite of WebsocketProvider, beta
• CryptoZombies Optimism NFT course : create, test & deploy
CryptoZombies Optimism NFT course : create, test & deploy
• DeCipher : contract doc generator from block explorer URL
DeCipher : contract doc generator from block explorer URL
• Secureum RACE #20: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Secureum RACE #20: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Security
• Vyper malfunctioning reentrancy locks in v0.2.15/16 & v0.3.0, Curve $70M exploit impacting Alchemix,
JPEG'd & Metronome with some Alchemix & JPEG'd funds returned Potentially vulnerable Vyper contracts
Vyper malfunctioning reentrancy locks in v0.2.15/16 & v0.3.0, Curve $70M exploit impacting Alchemix,
JPEG'd & Metronome with some Alchemix & JPEG'd funds returned
• Potentially vulnerable Vyper contracts
• LeetSwap (Solidly fork) on Base exploited , pool manipulated via internal function being public
LeetSwap (Solidly fork) on Base exploited , pool manipulated via internal function being public
• $20M sent to address poisoning spammer , USDT was later frozen
$20M sent to address poisoning spammer , USDT was later frozen
• Whitehacks kit : Foundry template to perform actions in single transaction using Flashbots
Whitehacks kit : Foundry template to perform actions in single transaction using Flashbots
• Solidity audit report generator (VSCode extension) using comments
Solidity audit report generator (VSCode extension) using comments
Ecosystem
• Eight years since Ethereum mainnet launch
Eight years since Ethereum mainnet launch
• Ethereum.org translatathon : translate the website to win prizes
Ethereum.org translatathon : translate the website to win prizes
Notable at app layer
• OndoFinance USD Yield (USDY): tokenized note (US Treasuries & bank deposits), non-US only
OndoFinance USD Yield (USDY): tokenized note (US Treasuries & bank deposits), non-US only
• Karma delegate registry : onchain DAO delegate info [Disclosure: Starbloom portfolio]
Karma delegate registry : onchain DAO delegate info [Disclosure: Starbloom portfolio]
• Umbra Cash stealth address anonymity : heuristics could link most recipients & suggested
countermeasures
Umbra Cash stealth address anonymity : heuristics could link most recipients & suggested
• Tx chat : chat like interface to browse an addresses onchain messages
Tx chat : chat like interface to browse an addresses onchain messages
• Golem Octant Epoch Zero : $1M distributed amongst ten public goods projects
Golem Octant Epoch Zero : $1M distributed amongst ten public goods projects
• Gitcoin Grants 18 applications open
Gitcoin Grants 18 applications open
Job Listings
• ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
• Wyoming Stable Token Commission seek Executive Director
Wyoming Stable Token Commission seek Executive Director
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
• GameStop removing iOS & browser extension wallets due to regulatory uncertainty
GameStop removing iOS & browser extension wallets due to regulatory uncertainty
• Revolut shutting down crypto services in US
Revolut shutting down crypto services in US
• Curve co-founder Michael Egorov deleveraging after Curve exploit
Curve co-founder Michael Egorov deleveraging after Curve exploit
• Ilya Lichtenstein admits to being Bitfinex 2016 hacker
Ilya Lichtenstein admits to being Bitfinex 2016 hacker
• US SEC charged Hex founder Richard Heart with unregistered offerings of securities and fraud for
misappropriating proceeds
US SEC charged Hex founder Richard Heart with unregistered offerings of securities and fraud for
• Kenya suspended local Worldcoin activities
Kenya suspended local Worldcoin activities
• FBI warns of NFT mint phishing scams
FBI warns of NFT mint phishing scams
General
• Rate-limiting nullifier (RLN) for spam prevention whilst preserving anonymity. Contribute to the
trusted ceremony
Rate-limiting nullifier (RLN) for spam prevention whilst preserving anonymity. Contribute to the
• ProtoGalaxy : efficient ProtoStar-style folding of multiple instances
ProtoGalaxy : efficient ProtoStar-style folding of multiple instances
• X (Twitter) takes @music username
X (Twitter) takes @music username
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-august-5-2023
